partyCommands.name: Party Commands
partyCommands.description: A bunch of party chat commands both fun and functional use !help in party chat

guildCommands.name: Guild Commands
guildCommands.description: A bunch of fun guild commands both fun and function use !help in guild chat

guildGM.name: Guild GM/GN
guildGM.description: Automatically sends gm/gn in guild chat whenever someone does

gyroRange.name: Gyro Range
gyroRange.description: Shows the range of the Gyrokinetic Wand

edragReminder.name: Edrag Reminder
edragReminder.description: Reminds you whenever p5 starsts to equip an edrag

readyReminder.name: Ready Reminder
readyReminder.description: Reminds you to ready up after a set amount of time

ultReminder.name: Ult Reminder
ultReminder.description: Reminds you to use ultimate in specific events

powerDisplay.name: Power Display
powerDisplay.description: Shows the power blessing on screen /movepower

dragonTimer.name: Dragon Timer
dragonTimer.description: Shows when a M7 dragon will spawn cmd for hud is /movedrag

dragonBoxes.name: Dragon Boxes
dragonBoxes.description: Shows custom boxes around the m7 status

p5Waypoints.name: P5 Waypoints
p5Waypoints.description: Marks specific location in the p5 of m7 (configureable by using /ct files > modules > odinclient > features > dungeons > spots)

bloodTracker.name: Blood Tracker
bloodTracker.description: Shows how many blood mobs are left doesn't work for some people (wip)

customSounds.name: Custom M7 Sounds
customSounds.description: Plays custom sounds at each phase in m7 check song.js if u dont know how dont bother with it

stairDisplay.name: Stair Display
stairDisplay.description: Shows if you are in the correct location to clip through the stair under you

brokenHype.name: Broken Hype
brokenHype.description: Alerts when your hype is broken

deployableTimer.name: Deployable Timer
deployableTimer.description: Shows a timer and the type of the deployable around you /moveflare

vanqNotifier.name: Vanq Notifier
vanqNotifier.description: Sends a message in party chat and makes a beacon whenever coords are detected in party chat

kuudraAlerts.name: Kuudra Alerts
kuudraAlerts.description: Shows messages on screen on specific events in kuudra

wayPoints.name: WayPoints
wayPoints.description: Makes a waypoint whenever getting coords in chat and /ow for an instant one of ur coords
